definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: My transition team held videoconferences with each regional office.
sentences.chinese: 我的过渡小组与每个区域办事处举办了视频会议。

sentences.english: This Saturday is my birthday and I'm goingto hold a party in my house.
sentences.chinese: 这个星期六是我的生日，我要在我家举办一个聚会。

sentences.english: China Philharmonic Orchestra is putting on a series of twelve concerts in winter.
sentences.chinese: 今年冬天中国爱乐乐团将举办十二场系列音乐会。

sentences.english: The first edition of the Yi Quan Lake Winter Swim Cultural Festival took place on January 16.
sentences.chinese: 这是于1月16号举办的首届溢泉湖冬季游泳文化节。

sentences.english: Next year has been designated as the Year of China-Pakistan Friendship. A number of exchange activities will be held.
sentences.chinese: 明年是“中巴友好年”，双方将举办一系列交流活动。

sentences.english: Filling is stuffing and fixing with slurry mixture of raw lacquer and fine gray gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 补灰就是用生漆和细石膏调和成浆状举办填密和修补。

sentences.english: They celebrate his birthday with a dance party.
sentences.chinese: 他们举办一个舞会来庆祝他的生日。

sentences.english: Organize your friends to hold a food festival.
sentences.chinese: 组织你的朋友们举办一次美食节。

sentences.english: They voted to give a concert to get some money for the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们建议举办一次音乐会为该医院弄些钱。

sentences.english: TimeSecurity guards organize activities from 8:00 in the morning until 8:00 in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 从早8点到晚8点，狱警们举办各种活动。

sentences.english: One of the health talk was hosted by CASSA.
sentences.chinese: 华美老年协会举办的健康讲座之一。

sentences.english: Do some out-of-door exercise every morning.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上举办一些户外锤炼。

sentences.english: There will be a fire drill at Rose Garden School.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰学园将举办一场消防演习。

sentences.english: What's the View of Every Party about the Second Forum of Textile and Clothing Technology?
sentences.chinese: 第二届新疆纺织服装技术论坛举办，各方怎么看？

sentences.english: It's quite trendy now. It's where the Olympic Games is going to happen,
sentences.chinese: 那里现在相当时髦了。那是奥运会将要举办的场地，

sentences.english: A series of extractive lectures have been held by the institute for 10 times.
sentences.chinese: 该学院推出的精品系列讲座已举办10场。

definition: to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
